cab.content: ---SEMl^2 ^^iJxthe Properw Jemment)26uMilSECRET.BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 12th AUGUST"1918.WE^Satt FRONT.Fighting continues on the front between the ANCRE and the OISE, but the line is now stabilising, and there is no change in the general situation since the noon report was issued.2.- ITALIAN AND,, MACEDONIAN,Fff ONIn ALBANIA an ItaMan detachment has driven the enemf from hie position at YAGQDINA, and compelled him to re-cross to the right bank of the SEMENI,General Staff,War Office SX1.12th A-agust 1918.Issued at 6,20 p0m,
